__e: Is it asking too much to see a badge, officer?
I'd like to see the badge now!
Listen, we're not dishing the dirt on your husband for the fun of it.
No, we just wanna ask you a few questions about your husband.
Your husband, your son, a job, even a dog.
What they said about your dad is wrong.
I know how hard it must be to believe everything that everybody's been telling you about your father.
But for you it's too soon to die so young by the hand of your father.
And yet I don't even know what your name is.
You won't tell me your name or even let me tell you mine.
I know you, but I don't remember your name.
Don't be alarmed, but I must talk to you about your son, about Bruno.
Well, if you could put me in touch with your son...
I didn't know it was for your child's birthday.
Why do you have your coat on?
THE REST OF US WILL ACCOMPANY THE DOCTORS DOWN TO VIEW A DEMONSTRATION
But I saw you coat and scarf around 1.30 am, when I went to get my knitting in the living room...
